alert.note: Alert for Imperial County Southwest (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 12 at 1:36AM PST until February 14 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 50 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...Southwest corner of Imperial County. * WHEN...From Monday evening through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions including I-8 near the San Diego County border. Winds could be strong enough to blow down power lines causing power outages.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
